attribute.name: drlMultilineArg1
attribute.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <MedusaProcessorSettingsObject> <derivedOutputFileType>PDF</derivedOutputFileType> <derivedOutputFileName>${name}.pdf</derivedOutputFileName> <checkInDerivedOutputToCurrentObject>false</checkInDerivedOutputToCurrentObject> <derivedOutputObjectUsesCommonDocumentModel>false</derivedOutputObjectUsesCommonDocumentModel> <versionFileOnCheckInViewFileToDerivedOutputObject>true</versionFileOnCheckInViewFileToDerivedOutputObject> <derivedOutputTypeName>Derived Output</derivedOutputTypeName> <derivedOutputName>${name}</derivedOutputName> <derivedOutputRevision>${revision}</derivedOutputRevision> <derivedOutputVault>eService Production</derivedOutputVault> <derivedOutputPolicyName>Derived Output Policy</derivedOutputPolicyName> <derivedOutputFormat>PDF</derivedOutputFormat> <derivedOutputCADType></derivedOutputCADType> <derivedOutputRelationshipName>Derived Output</derivedOutputRelationshipName> <fileNameTextPatternForSort>${FILE_NAME_WITHOUT_EXTENSION~split:-:1}</fileNameTextPatternForSort> <outputFileName>${FILE_NAME_WITHOUT_EXTENSION}.pdf</outputFileName> </MedusaProcessorSettingsObject>

attribute.name: drlMultilineArg2
